category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_refresh_bom_window_on_load
preference.preference_description: Defines the BOM window behavior during the load process. - Refresh the BOM window during the load process (YES) - Do not refresh the BOM window during the load process (NO) - Provide prompt to refresh the BOM window during the load process (WARNING)
